text: @TexasTribune conditions you can have under 65 which increase your chance of Covid-19 being severe or deadly but don't necessarily make you disabled - high blood pressure, cancer, obesity, asthma, COPD, being a caregiver of a disabled or older person, cardiac issues, being immunocompromised

domain.name: Interests and Hobbies Vertical

domain.name: Interests and Hobbies Category
domain.description: A grouping of interests and hobbies entities, like Novelty Food or Destinations
